description: Historical Sources on Decipherment of Several Writing Systems. Amiaud, A. ; Mechineau, L. , Tableau compare des ecritures babylonienne et assyrienne archaiques et modernes, avec classement des signes d'apres leur forme archaique, 1887 Source information Grotefend, G. F. , Ueber die Erklärung der Keilschriften, und besonders der Inschriften von Persepolis; aus: Ideen über die Politik, den Verkehr und den Handel der vornehmsten Völker der alten Welt, 1. Teil [Heeren, Arnold Hermann Ludwig], 1824 Source information Hilprecht, Hermann Vollrat, Explorations in Bible lands during the 19th century, 1903 Source information Hugo, Herman, De prima scribendi origine et universa rei literariae antiquitate, 1617 Source information Köcher, Franz, Beschwörungen gegen die Dämonin Lamastu. ; Inaugural - Dissertation zur Erlangung des Doktorgrades genehmigt von der philosophischen Fakultät der Universität zu Berlin von Franz Köcher aus Auma, 1949 Source information Layard, Austen Henry, The monuments of Nineveh: from drawings made on the spot; together with: a second series of the monuments of Nineveh; including bas-reliefs from the Palace of Sannacherib and bronzes from the ruins of Nimroud; from drawings made on the spot during a second expedition to Assyria; vol. 1, 1849 Source information Layard, Austen Henry, The monuments of Nineveh: from drawings made on the spot; together with: a second series of the monuments of Nineveh; including bas-reliefs from the Palace of Sannacherib and bronzes from the ruins of Nimroud; from drawings made on the spot during a second expedition to Assyria; vol. 2, 1853 Source information Rawlinson, Henry Creswicke [ed. ], The Cuneiform Inscriptions of Western Asia, vol. 1-3, 1861/1866 Works included: Vol. I: A Selection from the historical Inscriptions of Chaldeaa, Assyria, et Babylonia. Vol. 2: A Selection from the Miscellaneous Inscriptions of Assyria. Vol. 3: A Selection from the Miscellaneous Inscriptions of Assyria. Source information Rawlinson, Henry Creswicke [ed. ], The Cuneiform Inscriptions of Western Asia, vol. 4-5, 1875 Works included: Vol. 4: A Selection from the Miscellaneous Inscriptions of Assyria. Vol. 5: A Selection from the Miscellaneous Inscriptions of Assyria and Babylonia. Source information Rawlinson, Henry Creswicke, The Persian Cuneiform Inscription at Behistun, decyphered and translated; with a memoir on Persian Cuneiform Inscriptions in general and on that of Behistun in particular, 1846/47 Source information Schrader, Eberhard, Die assyrisch-babylonischen Keilinschriften: kritische Untersuchung der Grundlagen ihrer Entzifferung; nebst dem babylonischen Texte der trilinguen Inschriften in Transcription samt Übersetzung und Glossar, 1872 Source information Wilkins, Charles, A grammar of the Sanskrita language, 1808 Source information Online from: European Cultural Heritage Online (ECHO). Open Access Infrastructure for a Future Web of Culture and Science.
